alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alamance and northeastern Guilford Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McLeansville, or near Greensboro, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, McLeansville, Lake Cammack Park & Marina, Altamahaw-Ossipee, Haw River State Park, Lake Townsend Marina, Lake Townsend, Altamahaw, Lake Jeanette Marina and Lake Burlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
